articles.title: 36 Personal Care Products For Completely Normal Things
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Hanni launched Shave Pillow featuring cactus water and glycerin. I Dew Care introduced "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo. First Aid Beauty launched KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant designed for Keratosis Pilaris.

articles.title: Airbnb Launches Innovative Services, Enhanced Experiences, and a Redesigned App in Los Angeles, Featuring a Special Collaboration With Rocky's Matcha
articles.author: Christopher Gialanella
articles.summary: Airbnb launched 'Airbnb Services,' a suite of innovations, and reimagined its 'Experiences' program with personalized services like personal chefs, professional photography, and wellness treatments. A new mobile app accompanies these offerings, aimed at enhancing user travel experiences, with Los Angeles residents able to access select services even without booking a stay.

articles.title: IcyTreat Ice Cream Maker Machine – Make World-Class Flavor Ice Cream at Home
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: The IcyTreat™ Ice Cream Maker, a new home appliance, is being introduced. This ice cream maker uses Ic-Vortex™ Technology to create high-quality ice cream in the user's kitchen.

articles.title: Scouted: Meet the Effortless Way to Get a Radiant, Flawless, Golden Tan
articles.summary: Coco & Eve offers Tan Boosting Anti-Aging Body Oil SPF45, a water-resistant product. They also provide Express Tanning Antioxidant Mousse for those who lack beach time.

articles.title: The Dyson Supersonic hairdryer is on sale for $100 off this week
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $100 discount on its Supersonic Hair Dryer, bringing the price down to $329.99 for a limited time. The blue version of the Supersonic hair dryer, known for its intelligent heat control and five magnetic styling attachments, is featured in this promotion.

articles.title: ‘Little Clam' moving into Newport's Wayfinder hotel
articles.author: Sarah Bawden
articles.summary: The Wayfinder hotel in Newport is launching a new seafood restaurant called 'Little Clam' on June 4th. The restaurant aims to offer a fresh take on New England coastal dining, using local, seasonal, and sustainable ingredients under the direction of Chef Antonio Wormley.

articles.title: The 46 Best Gifts for New Dads (Other Than the Ability to Sleep In)
articles.author: Rachel Bowie
articles.summary: The article suggests several new products and services suitable as Father's Day gifts for new dads. These include the VEJA Etna sandals, a new slip-on style made from sustainable materials; the Google Pixel Watch 3, a smartwatch with sleep tracking capabilities; and a personalized book service from Wonderbly, where stories are created just for the recipient. Additionally, the article mentions Levain Bakery's New Parents Bundle, featuring cookies, coffee, and a onesie.

articles.title: New Subscription Service Sends Dads A New Pair Of Cargo Pants Every 9 Years
articles.summary: ManBox, a clothing subscription service, sends men a new pair of cargo pants every 9 years. The company recently launched a new feature that sends subscribers a duplicate of their favorite t-shirt every 15 years.

articles.title: Not a want, buta 'Thneed.' People think this new Lululemon dress is giving Dr. Seuss. Could it also be a recession indicator?
articles.author: Kaitlin Reilly
articles.summary: Lululemon launched a new product, the 2-in-1 Maxi Dress, priced at $148. This dress can be converted from a strapless dress to a flowy maxi skirt. The company launched this versatile dress at a time of economic uncertainty, which is why the dress has a dual function.

articles.title: Android 16 & Gemini Could Leave iOS' Notifications in the Dust
articles.author: Arthur Brown
articles.summary: Android 16 may introduce 'Magic Actions,' a new feature powered by Gemini AI to enhance smartphone notifications. This feature expands upon the existing Smart Actions by leveraging AI to offer more relevant actions across different apps, such as drafting emails or calling customer service based on notifications.

articles.title: I tested Aldi's new 'wine of the summer' and so should you
articles.author: Matthew Evans
articles.summary: A new, non-sparkling Prosecco has launched and is receiving positive reviews from wine critics and consumers. The wine is praised for its crispness, layered apple notes, and subtle sweetness. Some are predicting it as "the wine of the summer".

articles.title: ServiceOrca.com Announces Q3 Launch in the Middle East: A New Era for the Region's Service Economy
articles.author: Khaleej Mag
articles.summary: ServiceOrca.com, a global AI-powered service marketplace, is launching its platform in the Middle East. This introduces a new digital platform for searching and offering services in the region.

articles.title: Xrpturbo Surges 80% In 30 Days, Outpacing Other XRP Ecosystem Projects On Coingecko
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Xrpturbo (XRT) is launching an AI Agent Launchpad on the XRP Ecosystem. The product is named XRT.

articles.title: I dumped my old carrier for T-Mobile — how I saved a small fortune
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: T-Mobile launched Experience Plans, offering a five-year price guarantee and bundled perks, alongside the Family Freedom initiative, which covers up to $800 per line to switch carriers. These new Experience Plans include Experience More and Experience Beyond. T-Mobile claims families can save up to 20% compared to AT&T or Verizon.

articles.title: 'From idea to product': How Figma is redesigning workflows with its new line-up
articles.author: Steve Clark
articles.summary: Figma recently launched four new AI-powered design and development tools: Figma Make, Figma Sites, Figma Draw, and Figma Buzz. These tools aim to provide teams with a comprehensive platform for content ideation, design, and website creation, facilitating a faster transition from idea to product launch. The new suite expands Figma's existing offerings, including Figma Design and FigJam.

articles.title: Toyota Is Finally Making the EV the Car Market Sorely Needs
articles.summary: Toyota is launching the bZ Woodland SUV in the U.S. in early 2026. This new EV is designed as a versatile adventure vehicle with features like raised roof rails, special 18-inch wheels, and increased ground clearance and an all-wheel drive. It will come standard with Toyota's Safety Sense 3.0 suite and offer a range of up to 260 miles.

articles.title: I tested Aldi's new 'wine of the summer' and so should you
articles.author: Senior Trending News Reporter
articles.summary: Aldi launched a flat Prosecco wine priced at £5.99. This new product has received mixed reviews, with some wine enthusiasts praising its crispness and subtle sweetness, while others, including the reviewer and their family, were not impressed. Despite the mixed reception, Aldi encourages customers to try the polarising wine themselves.

articles.title: Want Your Child to Learn AI? Start with Building a Website for School
articles.author: TOI Education
articles.summary: A learning program uses AI-powered tools to enable children to build websites for various purposes like school projects or personal blogs. This service offers a ready-to-edit site within minutes and enhances creativity, digital literacy, and confidence.

articles.title: AI Summaries in Google Search: Czech Republic Launch – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google is rolling out its AI Overviews in the Czech Republic. These AI-generated summaries appear above traditional search results, offering instant answers. Czech search engine Seznam.cz introduced AI to summarize information in its search results in January.

articles.title: Guinness launches Johnnie Walker Blonde
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker has launched Johnnie Walker Blonde in Ghana, a new Scotch whisky designed for a new generation of drinkers. The whisky is described as smooth and light, with flavors of soft vanilla, creamy toffee, and citrus. Guinness Ghana hosted a trade event to showcase the new product to industry partners.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Cleaning Items That Work Fast And Work Well
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Windex has launched Fast Shine foam cleaner with a new formula designed for streak-free cleaning on mirrors, windows, and glass surfaces. The foam application prevents drips, making the cleaning process easier and faster. Reviewers highlight its effectiveness and ease of use, recommending it for achieving crystal-clear surfaces.

articles.title: Launching Soon - LLENA(AI)™ Links Dollar General® Stores to personalize nutrition experience for rural communities
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: LLENA(AI) is expanding its 'Cook It Yourself' program via Dollar General. The integration delivers AI-powered meal planning and grocery access to underserved rural communities.

articles.title: Transform Your Home with the Next-Generation Cleaning Companion: Tineco's Young Series – Powerful, Efficient, and Affordable
articles.summary: Tineco launched its Young Series floor washers, including the Y2, Y3, and Y5 Stretch Ultra models, in Singapore on May 16, 2025. The Young Series offers high-performance cleaning at an accessible price point starting from $299. The models feature one-touch self-cleaning and are designed for everyday messes on hard floors and carpets with promotional offers available at Courts stores and online.

articles.title: 4oImageAPI: Image generation tool
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: 4oImageAPI, an AI-powered image generation tool, offers a RESTful API for easy integration into existing systems, supports high-quality image outputs up to 4K resolution, and facilitates image-to-image generation with style transfer and content enhancement features. It is suitable for producing product mockups, marketing materials, infographics, or UI/UX prototypes.

articles.title: 27 Old Navy Pieces To Look Put-Together Effortlessly
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new clothing items, including mini T-shirt dresses, utility mini skirts, woven slide sandals, cinched tank tops, and high-waisted ankle jeans. Also featured are flutter sleeve tassle-tie tops, A-line midi skirts, classic jean jackets, T-shirts, and high-waisted linen blend shorts. The article also presents cami mini dresses, utility pants, double-strap sandals, skorts, and linen blend button-down shirts.

articles.title: Kioxia Announces First Enterprise NVMe™ SSD Built with 8th Generation BiCS FLASH™ TLC-Based Flash Memory Technology
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation announced the development and prototype demonstration of its new KIOXIA CM9 Series PCIe 5.0 NVMe SSDs. These enterprise SSDs utilize Kioxia's 8th generation BiCS FLASH TLC-based 3D flash memory. The KIOXIA CM9 Series is designed to support next-generation data center workloads.

articles.title: In surprise move Wegovy-maker Novo Nordisk ousts CEO amid sagging sales
articles.summary: Novo Nordisk ousted its CEO due to sagging sales following the launch of Wegovy four years prior. The company also cut its sales and profit forecasts.

articles.title: I pried open a cheap 600W charger and found this weird lump of 'goo' inside
articles.author: Adrian Kingsley-Hughes
articles.summary: A no-name brand introduced a 600W GaN charger with 8 ports priced at $99, which is being compared to Ugreen Nexode 300W unit costing $140. Initial testing of the charger revealed erratic behavior in its USB-C ports.

articles.title: Delta's new travel experiences: Your questions, answered
articles.summary: Delta is introducing new travel experiences starting October 1, including 'Basic,' 'Classic,' and 'Extra' options available for purchase on Delta.com and the Fly Delta app. These new experiences will be available for Delta Main, Delta Comfort and above, providing customers with more choices to fit their travel needs.

articles.title: LOHLI APP SURPASSES 30,000 DOWNLOADS IN 48 HOURS, ADDRESSES TECHNICAL GLITCHES
articles.author: Branded Content
articles.summary: Lohli, a Nigerian advertising technology platform, launched on May 13, 2025, and has achieved 30,000 downloads within two days. The platform rewards users for watching ads, taking surveys, and completing product reviews. It's available on the Google Play Store for Android users and via www.lohli.com for iOS users.

articles.title: Swan Water Unveils Seal of Trust, Gets NMA Backing
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Natural Spring Water (Swan Water) has unveiled its refreshed packaging, marking a significant development for the brand. The updated bottle design has also received endorsement from the Nigerian Medical Association (NMA).

articles.title: Aldi shoppers obsess over ‘foaming' soap in ‘finds aisle' – it's a Bath & Body Works dupe at an ‘insanely great' price
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi is offering beauty dupes including Lacura Sparkling Lemon Hand Soap (a Bath & Body Works dupe), a hand cream (a L'Occitane dupe), a facial cleanser (a Liz Earle dupe), Rejuvelate moisturizers (a L'Oreal dupe) and Q10 renew anti-wrinkle eye cream (a Nivea dupe). These dupes are significantly cheaper than the original products.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers rave about 'best fake tan ever' that 'dries in two minutes'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney Shopping Writer
articles.summary: Garnier's Ambre Solaire Natural Bronzer Quick Drying Body Self Tan Mist is being offered at a discounted price on Amazon, Look Fantastic, and Boots. The tanning mist promises a sun-kissed glow in an hour, dries quickly, and uses apricot oil for a natural bronze. Bondi Sands and Nivea also offer tanning products available at discounted prices.

articles.title: Introducing Motorola's stunning new motorola edge 60 fusion  May. 16, 2025 14:15
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Fusion in Australia, featuring new moto AI capabilities, a Sony LYTIATM 700C camera, and a bright display. The phone, priced at $699, will be available for purchase from May 22 at various retailers.

articles.title: Shoppers ditch foundation for 'must-have' BB cream that makes skin glow
articles.author: What's On Writer
articles.summary: Dr.Jart+ Premium BB Beauty Balm SPF 50 is available at LookFantastic for £29.60. NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer is available for £27 at LookFantastic. Erborian BB Cream with Ginseng retails for £38 at Boots, while Garnier SkinActive Classic Perfecting All-in-1 BB Cream is available for £7.48 at Amazon.

articles.title: Expect Endless Compliments With These 27 Lulus Dresses
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new dresses, including a textured puff-sleeve midi dress, a halter-neck midi dress, and a metallic puff-sleeve mini, among others. These dresses cater to various occasions, from weddings to casual outings, with prices ranging from $49 to $99 and sizes from XXS to 3X. Some dresses, such as the fold-over one-shoulder maxi, are available at Lulus for under $90.

articles.title: The power of a people-centric business model: A path to sustainable success
articles.author: Alfred Challis
articles.summary: MANZI Water launched over 100 outlets of eco-friendly automated MANZI Water Refill Stations in South Africa. The company's business model empowers local entrepreneurs through a decentralized system, creating over 300 jobs. The MANZI Water Refill Stations address the issue of inconsistent municipal water supply in underserved communities.

articles.title: Decades before Roomba, this robot promised to revolutionize household chores
articles.author: Gloria Shin
articles.summary: In 1983, a domestic robot named RB was introduced with the aim of assisting with household tasks like vacuuming, answering the phone, and fetching drinks. The robot's initial price was $2,400. Initial reactions to the robot were mixed.

articles.title: RETRO FIND: Decades before Roomba, this robot promised to revolutionize household chores
articles.author: Gloria Shin
articles.summary: In 1983, the RB robot debuted as a domestic robot designed to assist with household tasks such as vacuuming, answering the phone, and grabbing drinks. Despite being launched in a discount store, its price tag of $2,400 made it unaffordable for many shoppers.

articles.title: ZIGG Detergent Logo Unveiled by Bollywood Actress Mahek Chahal at Mr. & Miss Agra Grand Finale
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Savit Enterprise unveiled the logo of its new detergent brand, ZIGG Detergent, at the Mr. & Miss Agra 2025 beauty pageant. ZIGG Detergent is designed as a next-generation cleaning solution promising strong stain removal, fabric care, and lasting fragrance at an affordable price, targeting the modern Indian household.

articles.title: I tried the Dr Squatch Call of Duty soap and it proved even the sweatiest ...
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch introduced a Call of Duty-themed soap, aiming to appeal to gamers. This launch represents a novel approach in the grooming product market.

articles.title: Netflix Plans to Use AI to Blend Ads With Shows and Movies
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Netflix introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) for its advertisers. This AI is part of Netflix's new in-house advertising platform.

articles.title: A robot is coming to your home sooner than you think
articles.author: Mark Wessel
articles.summary: eufy has introduced the X10 Robot Vacuum and Mop, named Val. This next-generation robot vacuum utilizes AI technology for surface detection and collision avoidance, offering features such as wet/dry mopping and automatic floor mapping. eufy's X10 aims to be more efficient, save time, and promote sustainable living.

articles.title: Cadbury fans 'shaking' with excitement as new chocolate bar announced
articles.author: Tom Kershaw
articles.summary: Cadbury has announced the upcoming launch of a new version of its Twirl bar, called "Twirl White Dipped." This new variant will feature the classic Twirl flake with a white chocolate tip instead of the traditional milk chocolate. The release date is "coming soon," and the new bar will have a distinct packaging with a creamy white section at the end.

articles.title: Mudita Kompakt North America Optimized to Begin Shipping Next Week; Final Days for Special Pre-Order Pricing
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Mudita is set to begin shipping its Mudita Kompakt (North America Optimized) minimalist phone to crowdfunding backers in the United States and Canada next week. A special pre-order price of $369 is available for customers in these regions before regular pricing begins. This version is tailored to US and Canadian cellular network bands.

articles.title: Sidus Space Announces Successful On-Orbit Operation of FeatherEdge™ Gen-2 Aboard LizzieSat®-3
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sidus Space announced the successful on-orbit operation and commercial availability of FeatherEdge™ GEN-2, an advanced onboard edge computer integrated into LizzieSat®-3. FeatherEdge™ GEN-2 offers 100 TOPS of AI processing power and enables third-party algorithm integration, allowing customers to test AI solutions without their own satellite infrastructure. This positions Sidus Space to capitalize on growth through hardware sales, data processing services, and technology integration.

articles.title: Bosch pressure washer 'perfect for cleaning cars, patios, garden furniture' now 38% off
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: The Bosch EasyAquatak 110 High Pressure Washer is available for £55.99, discounted from £89.99 on Amazon. This compact pressure washer is designed for cleaning cars, patios, and garden furniture. The article also mentions alternative options like the McGregor Pressure Washer and the Karcher K 2 Classic Pressure Washer.

articles.title: Shanghai speeds up procedures for new imported goods
articles.author: Ding Yining
articles.summary: Shanghai is streamlining import procedures for companies launching new products with a pilot scheme offering swift customs clearance. This initiative includes a 'white list' for select brands like LV, Dior, Prada, and Burberry. Shanghai is also providing grants and simplified processes to encourage companies to launch new products, introduce innovative services, and open flagship stores, exemplified by the city's Global New Product Debut Season.

articles.title: I tested Aldi's new 'wine of the summer' and almost lost all my street cred
articles.author: Matthew Evans
articles.summary: Aldi has launched Costellore Still Prosecco DOC priced at £5.99. The new product is receiving mixed reviews, with some wine enthusiasts praising its crispness and layered apple notes, while others, including the author and their family, were not impressed. Aldi encourages customers to try the polarising wine for themselves.

articles.title: Anyone Who Buys These 30 Smart Products Is A Genius
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products designed for convenience and problem-solving. These include items like dishwasher cleaning tablets, microwave pasta cookers, winged eyeliner stamps, and bedsheet fasteners. The products aim to simplify daily tasks, improve personal care routines, and enhance home organization.

articles.title: Perfect Corp. Launches YouCam AI Chat: Your All-in-One AI Assistant in the Palm of Your Hand
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has introduced YouCam AI Chat, a new AI-powered assistant that helps users create, plan, learn, and stay inspired. Powered by technologies like GPT-4.1, GPT-4o, GPT-4o mini, and DeepSeek R1, the AI Chat offers features such as effortless image generation, predefined tasks, pre-set roles, and ready-to-use tools including an AI Image Generator and document summarizer.

articles.title: The Dr Squatch Call of Duty soap proves even the sweatiest gamer can smell good
articles.author: Joseph Kime
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch has launched a Call of Duty collection, featuring soaps and deodorants. The collection includes Ghost Grit and Sarge Soap, with scents designed to evoke the earthy environments of the Modern Warfare series. The products aim to immerse users in the game's action through their natural, earth-like scents.

articles.title: How 3D Product Modelling Is Helping Businesses
articles.summary: Digiup Shillong is empowering Northeast Indian businesses by launching a 3D product modeling service. This service creates hyper-realistic 3D versions of physical products, allowing customers to view them from any angle for e-commerce, AR, or digital marketing purposes. The service is targeted towards online retailers, startups, fashion brands, furniture makers, electronics sellers, and jewelers.

articles.title: Realme GT 7 Dream Edition teased in India: Expected to come with 7,000mAh battery, 120fps BGMI gaming, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Realme is launching the GT 7 Dream Edition smartphone, expected to launch on May 20th. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset and features a 7,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging and a 'Graphene Cover IceSense Design'. The Realme GT 7 Dream Edition will be sold on Amazon and the Realme website.

articles.title: Samsung launches 2025 AI washing machine with smart features
articles.author: 파이낸셜 리서치
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. has launched a new AI washing machine featuring enhanced performance and energy efficiency. The washer uses AI to automatically adjust water levels and rinse times and recognizes fabric types to optimize washing. An AI vibration reduction system and Wi-Fi connectivity with SmartThings support are also included, offering energy savings of up to 20%.

articles.title: MagentaONE, OTE's new commercial umbrella
articles.summary: OTE launched MagentaONE, a service replacing CosmoteONE aimed at subscribers with combined mobile and fixed telephony connections. The service connects telecommunications and non-telecommunications products, including fixed, mobile, television, food orders, bill payments, insurance and smart home. The Cosmote App has been upgraded, enabling subscribers to create their own MagentaONE scheme.

articles.title: Are You Really Washing Your Face Right? Here's Why Double Cleansing Matters
articles.summary: Anua introduced the Heart Leaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil featuring heartleaf extract. Beauty of Joseon launched Ginseng Cleansing Oil, blending soybean and ginseng seed oil. CeraVe offers Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser with ceramides and hyaluronic acid, and also Hydrating Facial Cleanser.

articles.title: Naver launches express delivery for CU goods
articles.author: 모두의 주식
articles.summary: Naver Corp. has launched "Now Delivery," a new express delivery service offering one-hour delivery for CU convenience store products through its app. Initially, the service supports deliveries from 3,000 CU stores nationwide, with plans to expand to another 4,000 stores later this year.

articles.title: Shopping in chat: OpenAI adds purchase options to ChatGPT
articles.author: DR. ITAY GAL
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new shopping experience within its ChatGPT service, allowing users to receive personalized product recommendations with direct purchase buttons. The new feature, which went live in 2025, will redirect users to external merchant websites for purchases. The product recommendations will be based on a combination of user information and online product reviews to offer an organic shopping experience.

articles.title: XPeng P7 Electric Sports Sedan Unveiled; Gets AI Driving Modes
articles.author: Mohit Bhardwaj
articles.summary: XPeng Motors has launched a new version of its P7 electric sports sedan, featuring a minimalist exterior, an AI-driven driving mode, and a range of up to 576 kilometers on a single charge. The car is scheduled for release in China in the third quarter of 2025.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers race to buy $14.99 stylish summer dress that shoppers praise ‘checks all the boxes'
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Serra Hybrid Dress, priced at $14.99. The dress features a scoop neck, shelf bra, and side seam pockets, and is available in sizes small to extra large. Shoppers praise the dress's comfort and versatility for various occasions.

articles.title: Weeks after Amazon's Alexa+ AI launch, a mystery: where are the users?
articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa+, a new AI-powered voice assistant, meant to revitalize the existing Alexa service. Despite showcasing its capabilities and promising early access in late March, the rollout has been slow, and verifiable public reviews are scarce. The service struggles with speed and occasional inaccuracies. Alexa+ is designed to handle complex requests like shopping advice and food ordering, contrasting with the previous version's single request handling.

articles.title: Get Ready: iQOO Neo 10 – Malaysia's First Smartphone With The New Snapdragon 8s Gen 4
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: iQOO is launching the iQOO Neo 10 smartphone in Malaysia, marking the debut of the Neo Series in the country. The iQOO Neo 10 features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor, advanced cooling, a high-refresh-rate display, and long-lasting battery life, targeting mobile gamers and power users.

articles.title: Gen Alpha is getting zits, so acne brands are meeting them at a popular hangout
articles.author: Parija Kavilanz
articles.summary: Galderma's Differin partnered with Dentsu to launch 'Level Up Lobby' on Roblox, featuring three mini-games ('Foam Blaster', 'Power Patch Splat', 'Zit Zapper') to educate Gen Alpha about acne care and Differin products.  The campaign has attracted over three million visits in less than 30 days, with over 365,000 mini-games played and nearly 12,000 hours of brand engagement.

articles.title: Neural DSP Nano Cortex review: NanOS 2.0 update – 'Neural's compact pedal becomes a true ...
articles.author: Guitar.com
articles.summary: Neural DSP launched the Nano Cortex, described as "the easiest to use looper on the market just got even better". The launch did not go as well as the company would have liked, despite a teasing marketing campaign.

articles.title: Acer Gadget Unveils New AI-Powered Wearables at COMPUTEX 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: A company debuts its first AI translation earbuds and a smart ring designed for AI-enhanced communication and wellness tracking. The company also showcases its latest e-mobility products.

articles.title: Rain Or Shine, This Sleek Machine Gives You Clean & Dry Laundry Every Time You Need It
articles.author: Dale John Wong
articles.summary: Coway introduced the 2-in-1 Washer Dryer, which has a 10kg washing and 6kg drying capacity. This machine combines washing and drying, eliminating the need to move clothes between separate appliances, which saves time and space.

articles.title: Smart Delivery Positions Mr Nang as a Leader in Australia's Cream Charger Market
articles.author: Nathan Spears
articles.summary: Mr Nang has introduced a smart delivery system for cream chargers in Australia, offering ultra-fast delivery across Melbourne suburbs, with orders often arriving within an hour. This system is powered by advanced logistics planning, localized warehouses, and a dedicated fleet of couriers, ensuring minimal waiting time. Mr Nang has also expanded its offerings to include related accessories and complementary items.

articles.title: Transform Your Home with the Next-Generation Cleaning Companion: Tineco's Young Series - Powerful, Efficient, and Affordable
articles.author: Media Outreach Newswire
articles.summary: Tineco is launching its Young Series floor washers in Singapore, designed for everyday messes and suitable for hard floors and carpets. The series includes models like Y5 Stretch Ultra, Y3, and Y2, offering features such as one-touch self-cleaning.

articles.title: Beauty must-haves I'm obsessed with this week
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Aldi launched new skincare range, including Matcha Gel Wash, Rice Cleanser, Hydrating Aqua Face Cream and Plumping Face Cream. Boots introduced No7 Future Renew Serum, designed to reverse visible signs of skin damage. e.l.f. launched Power Grip Dewy Setting Spray for dewy finish.

articles.title: Transform Your Home with the Next-Generation Cleaning Companion: Tineco's Young Series – Powerful, Efficient, and Affordable
articles.author: Media Out Reach Newswire
articles.summary: Tineco has launched its Young Series Floor Washers in Singapore, designed for new homeowners. The series includes the Y2, Y3, and Y5 Stretch Ultra models, offering high-performance cleaning at an accessible price point. Exclusive launch promotions are available at Courts stores and Courts.com.sg from May 19th to June 8th.

articles.title: Aldi releases 50p 'Starbucks-style' dessert in two popular flavours
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced Cake Pops, a cheaper alternative to Starbucks' version, available in birthday cake and cookies and cream flavors. These are sold in packs of four for £1.99 and have been available since May 12 in the baked section of the store.

articles.title: Netflix ads are about to get an AI super-charge, and that's not chill
articles.author: Luke Edwards
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing a new advertising system powered by generative AI to enhance ad relevance for viewers. This system, designed for ad-supported Netflix subscribers, may incorporate interactive midroll and pause overlays, potentially impacting the viewing experience. The company launched its own in-house advertising.

articles.title: Lava Launches Demo at Home to Bring Smartphone Experience to Customers Doorsteps
articles.author: Biswaranjan Jena
articles.summary: Lava International Limited has launched Demo@Home, a new service that allows customers in Delhi, Mumbai, and Bengaluru to experience Lava smartphones at their homes. Through Demo@Home, customers can request a free demonstration of select Lava smartphones such as Agni 3, Blaze Duo, Blaze 3 5G, and Blaze AMOLED.

articles.title: POCO set to shake up Nigeria's smartphone market with two exciting new launches
articles.author: BI Africa
articles.summary: POCO, a sub-brand of Xiaomi, is preparing to launch two new smartphones, the POCO C71 and POCO X7 Pro, in Nigeria. The POCO C71 is aimed at the entry-level market, focusing on essential features, while the POCO X7 Pro targets the high-end market with flagship-grade performance. These new product introductions aim to cater to a wider range of Nigerian consumers with varying needs and budgets.

articles.title: Meizu Note 16 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Meizu officially announced the Meizu Note 16 smartphone on May 13, 2025. The 5G-ready smartphone features a 6600 mAh battery with 40W wired charging, a Unisoc T8200 processor, and a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel main lens.

articles.title: Revolutionizing India: NxtQuantum's Bold Entry into the Smartphone Arena
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, under the leadership of Madhav Sheth, is launching a new smartphone designed and manufactured in India under the AI+ initiative. This launch is partnered with Flipkart, utilizing their extensive delivery network for wide accessibility across India.

articles.title: YouTube Will Place Ads at Most Engaging Video Moments
articles.author: Emma Collins
articles.summary: YouTube launched a new AI-powered feature called Peak Points for ad placement in videos, which identifies the most engaging moments in a video for placing ads. The company also announced other innovative functions, including Cultural Moments Sponsorships, Kickoff Weekend, Masthead on CTV, and Shoppable CTV at Brandcast.

articles.title: Madhav Sheth Unveils AI+ Logo, Signaling India's New Tech Era
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, under Madhav Sheth, has unveiled the AI+ brand, signaling its entry into the smartphone market. The AI+ smartphone, focused on local design and manufacturing, will be distributed through a partnership with Flipkart. A full reveal of the AI+ smartphone and its operating system is anticipated in the upcoming months.

articles.title: Google Chrome on mobile can now zoom into text without messing the page design
articles.summary: Google Chrome is introducing a new Page Zoom feature for Android, allowing users to adjust text size without altering the webpage layout. Additionally, Google is launching Expressive Captions, an AI-powered feature offering real-time captions across Android 15+ devices, and has fully rolled out Chrome's Optical Character Recognition (OCR) tool. Enhancements to Gemini's TalkBack feature enable more interactive image descriptions for visually impaired users.

articles.title: Madhav Sheth, Founder and CEO of NxtQuantum Shift Technologies
articles.author: Ani Pr
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, founded by Madhav Sheth, has unveiled the AI+ logo, signaling the upcoming launch of its first smartphone. The AI+ smartphone, designed and manufactured in India, will be launched on Flipkart and promises a new approach to smartphone technology, prioritizing trust, user focus, and intelligent design.

articles.title: Meet man, who quit job abroad, returned to India to sell…, Mukesh Ambani family are his customers, Bill Gates, Mark Zuckerberg tasted his…
articles.summary: In 2020, Nahaz founded Cremberie to introduce non-sour yogurt to the Indian market. He initially promoted the yogurt by distributing free samples and refined the product based on customer feedback. Cremberie's yogurts are now delivered in five-star hotels and on flights, with popular flavors including Spicy Sambharam Yogurt and Fruit-Based Yogurt.

articles.title: Introducing Motorola's stunning new motorola edge 60 fusion
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the motorola edge 60 fusion in Australia for $699, featuring a leather-inspired finish and Pantone Validated Colours. The smartphone includes moto ai, offering tailored summaries and AI-driven capabilities like Next Move, Playlist Studio, and Image Studio, along with a Sony LYTIA 700C sensor camera and a bright display. The phone will be available from 22 May at various retailers.

articles.title: Introducing Motorola's stunning new motorola edge 60 fusion
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the motorola edge 60 fusion in Australia on May 22, 2025, featuring moto ai, a Sony LYTIATM 700C camera, and a bright Pantone Validated Colours display. The phone is priced at $699 and has a leather-inspired finish, Corning Gorilla Glass 7i protection, and water resistance.

articles.title: Introducing Motorola's stunning new motorola edge 60 fusion
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the motorola edge 60 fusion in Australia, priced at $699, featuring moto ai, a Sony LYTIATM 700C camera, and a bright display. It offers a leather-inspired finish, Corning® Gorilla® Glass 7i protection, and underwater protection. The device will be available from May 22 at major retailers and online.

articles.title: Doogee Blade20 Turbo Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Doogee announced the Blade20 Turbo in Q2 2025. This 5G smartphone features a 10300 mAh battery with 33W wired charging, a 6.6-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 7050 processor, a 50MP + 2MP dual rear camera, and a 16MP front camera. It runs on Android 15, has 8GB RAM and 256GB storage, and is available in Desert Titanium and Black.

articles.title: Kioxia Announces First Enterprise NVMe™ SSD Built with 8th Generation BiCS FLASH™ TLC-Based Flash Memory Technology
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation announced the development and prototype demonstration of its new KIOXIA CM9 Series PCIe ® 5.0 NVMe™ SSDs. These enterprise SSDs are built with Kioxia's 8th generation BiCS FLASH™ TLC-based 3D flash memory, incorporating CMOS directly Bonded to Array (CBA) technology.

articles.title: Lotte Duty Free are letting you earn Qantas Points just by shopping
articles.author: Maddy Wilson
articles.summary: Lotte Duty Free has partnered with Qantas Frequent Flyer, allowing customers to earn Qantas Points for every dollar spent in-store or online. Customers can shop in Lotte Duty Free stores at Brisbane and Melbourne international airports and also online to purchase product range from souvenirs and gifts, to beauty products and alcohol.

articles.title: Beyond the BBQ: Fresh Ways to Upgrade Your Summertime Spreads
articles.author: Casie Cook
articles.summary: Lunds & Byerlys (L&B) promotes its various products for summer grilling, including L&B American Wagyu, L&B Bacon Cheddar, L&B Turkey Wild Rice, L&B Plant-Based Black Bean, L&B Mango Coconut Salmon burgers and L&B Mushroom & Swiss, L&B Apple Wild Rice, L&B Chili Fire Cheddar or L&B Classic bratwursts. The company also offers various deli salads like L&B Tortellini pasta salad, L&B Seafood salad, L&B Mediterranean cucumber salad, and L&B Cherry chicken pasta salad.

articles.title: AI: The Future of Communication
articles.author: Hans India Digital
articles.summary: Bobble AI has evolved from a predictive keyboard to an AI-powered communication ecosystem. They are expanding into Southeast Asia and the Middle East, offering localized language tech and culturally relevant content. The company is also developing new features around voice, avatars, and contextual recommendations for smarter and more expressive communication.

articles.title: Android 16 Release Date Confirmed And These Phones Will Be Getting It Soon
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Google confirmed the release date for Android 16. The new version will be rolled out for various phones early.

articles.title: Netflix is using AI to make advertisements more watchable
articles.summary: Netflix plans to roll out AI-driven advertisements to its ad-supported tier users. The new ads will be context-aware, personalized, and interactive, featuring clickable overlays, QR codes, and product placements. Generative AI enables Netflix to provide advertisers with hyper-targeted messaging options.

articles.title: The One-Way Door of AWS Transform: a Secret 24-month Lock-Up
articles.author: Corey Quinn
articles.summary: AWS has launched AWS Transform, a new service that utilizes GenAI for migrating Mainframe, .NET, and VMware workloads. The service requires users to run the transformed workload on AWS for a minimum of 24 months after completion.

articles.title: Oppo's AI Phone Gamble – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Oppo has launched its Reno14 smartphone series, targeting young consumers with advanced camera technology and AI-driven features. The new 'XiaoBu Memory' feature, integrating DeepSeek's AI, enhances productivity for students and young professionals by intelligently organizing on-screen information.

articles.title: 35 Products With Before And After Pics That'll Have You Doing A Double-Take To Make Sure You're Not Hallucinating
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Sol de Janerio introduced Brazilian Bum Bum body cream, a lotion with guarana extract, coconut oil, and caffeine. Revlon released an oil-absorbing volcanic face roller for instant oil removal.

articles.title: How Terra Premium is catering to Nigeria's diverse tastes
articles.author: Amos
articles.summary: TGI Group introduced Terra Premium Seasoning Cube in Nigeria, targeting discerning shoppers in modern retail spaces. Available in chicken and beef flavors, the product features elegant packaging, a refined blend of spices, and high-quality ingredients to deliver a premium culinary experience. The new product aims to set a new standard in Nigeria's seasoning landscape.

articles.title: £34 knocked off pressure washer 'surprisingly powerful for its size'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: The Bosch EasyAquatak 110 High Pressure Washer is available for purchase from Amazon, Argos and Currys. The KARCHER K4 Power Control Pressure Washer is available from Currys. The Nilfisk Titan 120 Pressure Washer is available from Argos. The article also highlights new deals, sales, bargains through MyLondon's new WhatsApp Community.

articles.title: 2025 Xpeng P7 EV: Striking Tesla rival breaks cover
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Xpeng is set to introduce the second-generation P7, an electric sedan, in China later in 2025. The new model will feature a new design direction.

articles.title: Panda Mini rice cooker review: Small but perfectly formed
articles.author: Danielle Amato
articles.summary: Yum Asia has introduced the Panda Mini Rice Cooker, a compact appliance featuring a Fuzzy Logic microprocessor for consistent cooking results. It offers multiple functions including rice cooking and multicooker capabilities suitable for small households. The product aims to simplify rice preparation and other dishes like dim sum and cake.

articles.title: 삼성전자, 2025년형 전자동 ‘AI 통버블 세탁기' 신제품 출시
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is launching its 2025 'AI Bubble Washing Machine' lineup, equipped with AI features to optimize washing performance, conserve energy, and reduce noise. The washing machines have features like 'AI Custom Washing', 'AI vibration noise reduction system' and 'bubble waterfall' and are available in four colors with prices ranging from 640,000 to 950,000 won.

articles.title: Bringing Motorola Edge 60 Stylus to Life with Live Doodle Activation
articles.author: News Team
articles.summary: Flipkart, in collaboration with SW Network, launched an experiential activation at Nexus Select Citywalk mall in New Delhi to showcase the Motorola Edge 60 phone's stylus. The activation transformed the mall's courtyard into a live canvas where artists created real-time doodles with a giant stylus installation, further extending the campaign into print media.

articles.title: OnQ GLOBAL, INC. UNVEILS REBRAND AND STRUCTURAL EVOLUTION
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: OnQ Global, Inc. launched a 'Next Era of Streamlined Innovation and Service Excellence'.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge 48 Hours Later: Great Engineering, But Too Pricey
articles.author: Ben Sin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thinner flagship phone featuring a 200-megapixel camera, titanium body, and the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. It incorporates Galaxy AI features, has a 3,900 mAh battery, and is priced similarly to the S25 Ultra but with fewer cameras and a smaller battery.

articles.title: How To Tell If Your AI Strategy Is Real Or Just Another PR Hype
articles.author: Kolawole Samuel Adebayo
articles.summary: Fetcherr is developing an AI system that merges pricing and revenue management for the airline sector. This system aims to re-architect workflows and optimize operations, pricing, logistics, and strategy, distinguishing itself from superficial AI applications. According to Uri Yerushalmi, Fetcherr's Chief AI Officer, the system exemplifies how AI can fundamentally reshape operational processes in entire industries.

articles.title: Today's NYT Mini Crossword Clues And Answers For Saturday, May 17
articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.summary: LinkedIn introduced new games: Pinpoint, Queens, and Crossclimb. "Link in BIO" is a promotional catchphrase on social media for LinkedIn. Frase ByForbes™ is also mentioned, potentially indicating a partnership or featured content.

articles.title: AI hair washing machines make waves
articles.author: Li Menghan
articles.summary: AI hair washing machines debuted in Shenzhen, Guangdong province. The machines have since appeared in areas such as Fujian province, the Guangxi Zhuang autonomous region and Shanghai.

articles.title: Oppo bets big on AI phones
articles.summary: Oppo has launched its Reno14 smartphone series, which is designed for young consumers, and it features advanced camera technology, enhanced software, and AI-driven features. The Reno14 integrates DeepSeek's AI technology in a new feature called "XiaoBu Memory" which recognizes and organizes on-screen information.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers race to buy heavily reduced hot tubs in cheaper than B&Q, Wilko and ...
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Amazon is offering hot tubs for sale, allowing shoppers to enjoy them in their gardens this summer. This constitutes a promotional offer or a product introduction relevant to consumers.

articles.title: Qualcomm unveils Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 with AI, gaming, and camera upgrades for mid-range smartphones
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Qualcomm has unveiled its Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 mobile platform. The chipset introduces enhanced AI functions, gaming improvements, and upgraded camera support. It also enables large language models (LLMs).

articles.title: Lucky Energy is Building a 'Rebel Brand' to Disrupt the $25 Billion Energy Drink Market
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lucky Energy has launched a new energy drink marketed as a "better-for-you" beverage. The drink contains five simple ingredients and zero sugar, targeting health-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 could be coming to Switch 2 this year
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Nintendo might release a port for its new console. PS5 and Xbox Series X may receive a long-awaited patch.

articles.title: NASD to unveil new products, unlock investment in Real Estate and Co-operative Societies
articles.author: Business Day Online
articles.summary: NASD OTC Exchange Plc is planning to unveil innovative products. These products aim to unlock investment opportunities in the real estate and co-operative societies sectors.

articles.title: YouTube Unveils New AI Feature to Find the Best Moments for Ads in Videos
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: YouTube introduced Peak Points, a new AI feature, for its advertisers. The feature was revealed at YouTube's Brandcast event in New York.

articles.title: Wendy's just released its 2nd Frosty spinoff in 55 years
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Wendy's is launching a new Frosty variety to prepare customers for the summer season. This represents a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: AI hair washing machines make waves
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: A new product, "AI hair washing machines," debuted in Shenzhen, Guangdong province. This suggests the introduction of a novel service or product aimed at automating hair washing.

articles.title: Clarins' luxury �18 buildable tan 'ticks every box' for no streaking and no smell
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: The tanning milk is easy to apply and doesn't streak if rubbed in well. It also lacks the typical unpleasant fake tan smell.

articles.title: Buy Morgan Wallen 'I'm the Problem' Album on Vinyl, CD Online
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Morgan Wallen launched his new album 'I'm The One.' The album is available for purchase at various retailers.

articles.title: Rumor: Xbox Handheld Will Have Something Big in Common With the Nintendo Switch
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Microsoft is reportedly planning to release a new handheld Xbox console. This suggests the introduction of a new product line within Microsoft's gaming division.

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - May 16, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci unveiled the Gucci Giglio handbag at the 2026 Cruise fashion show in Florence. This large GG denim bag features Web trim and a detachable pouch, measuring 23.6" W x 18.5"H x 6.3"D and costing $1950.

articles.title: Weed Report: The digital dive into cannabis
articles.author: Chris Ahrens
articles.summary: Several cannabis delivery apps, including SD Fleet, Sea Weed, Eaze, and Budzilla, offer online ordering services in San Diego County. Users can create accounts, verify their IDs, browse menus, save delivery addresses, and set up payment details for convenient cannabis purchases through these apps.
